item.description: A deliciously dry yet fruity white Rioja with a fresh appealing taste. Grape Varieties: Viura. Ageing: This wine is best enjoyed when young and fresh. Great With: Sea food, white meat and salads. Serve: Enjoy this wine chilled 9-11°C.

item.Product_name: Faustino Rivero Rioja Crianza Yellow Label
item.description: Smooth, fruity and elegant with hints of fine oak. A well-balanced velvety structure lingering on the finish.
An award-winning and velvetysmooth Reserva with notes of damson, plum, cherries and spice, refined by a hint of oak- Brilliant with a roast leg of lamb.

Beautiful yellow green colour. In nose is fruity and fresh with tropical hints as passion fruit and also elegant notes of herbs, all in balance with a crispy and fresh mouth with an attractive fruity aftertaste.
With 18 months’ ageing in barrel followed by over five years in bottle, this velvety Reserva has a touch of spice blended with rich, ripe fruit flavours.
Elegant aromas of strawberries and red cherries with a refreshingly crisp aftertaste.
Refreshing with zesty lemon & peach flavours & a crisp finish
A deliciously refreshing rosé, bursting with summer fruit flavours
Smooth & medium-bodied with spicy bramble flavours
Fresh and lively, with rich flavours of peach, stone fruit and lemon zest. The palate is creamy and textured and has delicate sweetness from oak complexity. Generous length.

Soft, round and full bodied with rich plum and mulberry fruit flavours, complexed with dark chocolate, vanilla and clove spice. Seamless and well integrated with its firm, chewy tannins, balanced acidity, generous length and warm lingering earthy, chocolate and dark fruit finish.

item.Product_name: Banrock Station Light Chardonnay Sauvignon Blanc
item.description: Flavours of melon, pear & apricot with a fresh floral note and a touch of sweetness.
Vibrant, with red berry fruit aromas & a taste packed with juicy strawberry, raspberry & cherry flavours. Balanced by a touch of sweetness.

Juicy, ripe plum and red berry flavours are the essence of this wine, but the spicy undertones and fresh mint aromas give a structured dimension which can only be achieved through the complex blending of these three grape varieties.
The honeydew melon and peach flavours of the Viognier provides depth of flavour, the Chenin Blanc gives creaminess and the Sauvignon Blanc ensures this wine has a zesty, crisp finish.
A refreshing & aromatic wine with ripe melon, green apple & pear, complimented by subtle hints of vanilla oak
A smooth, medium bodied wine with warm spicy aroma's, hints of ripe forest fruits supported by dark mocha and cherry to give a long lingering finish
A deep crimson with purplish tints, this wine reveals complex, delicate aromas

A classic Chianti, offering aromas of red berry fruit, with vanilla and floral hints of violets. Flavoursome, medium-bodied palate, fresh in structure and with a delicious balance of fruit and savoury notes. Typical spicy sensations from the oak on the back palate.
A generous, rounded palate featuring ripe dark berries, plum and dusty mulberry with a hint of regional mint. Fine grained soft tannins add to the lingering attractive fruit.

Deep ruby-red in colour, with hints of dark berries and wood. This wine is complex and elegant, the tannins are well integrated, balanced and soft. The palate if packed with rich extracts of wild spices, herbs and savoury fruit.
Tempting flavours of blackberry, raspberry and chocolate and is silky smooth.
Barefoot Moscato is a sweet wine with hints of delicious mouth-watering juicy peach and apricot flavours. Notes of lemon and orange citrus complement a crisp and refreshing finish.
Crisp and full of citrus and peach flavours.
An elegant wine with enticing aromas of honeydew and nectarines. Flavours of pear and lime complement the soft, smoky finish.
Barefoot Shiraz is full of jammy blackberry flavours and is velvety smooth.
Packed with seriously lush pineapple and strawberry and tastes deliciously fruity.
Flavours on the palate of blackberry and blackcurrant with hints of spice are soft and elegant with a balanced acidity and medium body. The finish is long and smooth with round tannins.
White stone fruit flavours of apricot and peach are complemented by mineral and slate elements leading into a zesty finish.

item.Product_name: Castillo San Lorenzo Rioja Gran Reserva 75cl
item.description: The quality of the harvest, combined with meticulous selection of only the finest grapes, followed by long and careful oak maturation followed by time in bottle create this subtle, refined structured wine of great complexity and flavour.

This wine is a deep red colour with violet hues. On the nose there are refined notes of ripe red berries, while on the palate it is full bodied, sophisticated and structured, with a pleasantly lingering finish.

item.Product_name: Tesco Finest Bisol Prosecco di Valdobbiadene
item.description: This award winning Prosecco's aromas of wildflowers are balanced on the palate by notes of pear, and a refreshingly crisp acidity.
Intense gooseberry, ripe herbal lime notes underpinned by the classically pungent melon, guava and passion fruit aromatics.
Wonderfully easy to drink, Black Tower Fruity White has fresh fruit flavours of pineapple and ripe mango.
Full of expressive fruit flavour and with a warm finish, this wine has a typical spicy character of Pinot Grigio.
The grapes combine perfectly providing delicate fruit flavours reminiscent of raspberries and strawberries.
Only 80 calories per 125 ml glass, yet still a delicious mouthful with delicate floral aromas and a touch of ripe melon.
Lively and refreshing with flavours of raspberry and cherry.
Rich with pineapple and apricot flavours with a fresh citrus finish and a hint of oak.
A floral, fruity wine with great body and freshness, this St Veran can be drunk straight away. Hand selected Chardonnay grapes, grown in the St Veran vineyards, South of Burgundy.

A warm, modern style wine with notes of dark cherries, figs and coffee in a delicate oak frame. Generous on the palate, revealing a bright fruity core. A well structured and balanced wine with a soft and long finish.

Expansive nose of pear and honey, with just a touch of bread crust. Elegant on the palate, showing excellent concentration, soft tannins and fleshy taste. Elements of dried herbs and polished wood on the finish.

item.Product_name: Piccini Prosecco Vino Spumante Extra Dry 750ml
item.description: Thin and generous bubbles that has intense fruity aromas with notes of apple and pear.

item.Product_name: Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore Docg Extra Dry Ca'Val
item.description: Fresh and elegant, it has a rich, fruity nose of apple and pear, great balance between acidity and softness.
Clean and fresh, distinctive aromas of apple and pear with hints of tropical and citrus fruit and a lovely, crisp finish.

item.Product_name: Blossom Hill Winemaker's Reserve Sparkling Zinfandel 75cl
item.description: This crisp sparkling wine has vivid berry aromas on the nose. The palate has summer fruit flavours with soft lively bubbles making it the perfect drink for any celebrations. This wine is wonderful with hors d’oeuvres or as an aperitif.

item.Product_name: Blossom Hill Winemakers Reserve White Zinfandel 75cl
item.description: A delightful aroma of strawberries and flavour of red, ripe watermelon. Lively on the palate the wine has a refreshing finish.
Smooth with aromas of ripe red berry fruits, a hint of blackcurrant & subtle spice.
Crisp and fresh with aromas of ripe melon, apricot and a delicate touch of vanilla.

item.Product_name: Blossom Hill Winemakers Reserve Merlot California 75cl
item.description: Velvety soft with ripe red cherry and a hint of vanilla.
Deep purple in colour, this wine has aromas of ripe jammy fruits, cocoa and well integrated vanilla oak. On the palate it’s powerful & intense with a long finish.
It has perfect balance, softness, and depth of fresh fruit flavours.

It has intense aromas of crystallized fruit, cinnamon and gingerbread and the myriad flavours of plum, prune, nuts & orange peel fill the mouth. The wine is sweet and the natural acidity and spicy oak give it a fresh, complex, lingering finish.

item.Product_name: Tesco Finest Old Vine Selection Garnacha 75cl
item.description: Made from 100% Garnacha, this rich Spanish red has flavours of black cherry and plum- It’s a great all-rounder, perfect for roast lamb and barbecues – whatever weather April brings.

item.Product_name: Tesco Finest Viña Mara Rioja Gran Reserva
item.description: A rich, mature flavour with raspberry and exotic spice. A long, complex finish

item.Product_name: Tesco Finest Vina Mara Rioja Reserva 750ml
item.description: Aromas of raspberry and vanilla spice. A rich, fruity flavour of red berry fruits with a layer of oak spice.

Ruby-red colour, with aromas of blackcurrant, fresh cherries, and notes of smoke and spice, especially black pepper. Good weight on the palate with harmonious, mouth-filling tannins. A complex wine that is easy to drink with a long pleasing finish.
A clean pale, golden colour with aromas of citrus fruits, peach and orange blossoms. The palate is lush, full and persistent, with nicely balanced acidity and a pleasing finish.
Fresh and clean citrus aromas are followed on the palate by a dry purity of lime fruit with a subtle mineral edge
An elegant, full bodied white wine with aromas of tropical fruit, exotic lychees and roses and a spicy lingering aftertaste.

This stylish 100% Syrah from the Rhône is sourced from vines that grow in 11 vineyards near the town of Tain l’Hermitage-This creates layers of flavour including overtones of violets and black olives alongside blackberry and redcurrant fruit.
Concentrated aromas of red and blackberry fruits, rich, rustic and spicy, yet elegant and with a long lingering flavour
Fresh raspberries and strawberries dominate the nose along with a distinct leafy note. It has a creamy palate with plenty of natural juicy flavours reminiscent of summer berries in a glass.

Zibibbo Rosa is an exciting new addition to the Brown Brothers range. A refined pink sparkling wine that is slightly drier than Zibibbo; while still sharing its deliciously fruity style. Zibibbo Rosa is a beautiful pale pink colour and shows lifted aromas of strawberries and summer fruits. On the palate this vibrant sparkling has characters of strawberries and watermelon followed by a clean fresh finish.
Bright and expressive with aromas of bright cherry and savoury spice. The palate is medium bodied with dark cherry and rhubarb flavours supported by supple tannins.
Vibrant wines with fruit driven flavours.
Vibrant wines with fruit driven flavours.
This wine has tropical notes of pineapple and melon with hints of herb. It is fresh with a creamy finish.
With citrus and white flowers on the nose this is a fresh tasting wine.
A well balanced but full bodied wine with red berry notes
This Champagne shows an elegant freshness, with notes of citrus and cream. With age it will develop a rich biscuity flavour.
The nose has a fresh aroma of fruit with hints of yeast and toastiness. Clean, refreshing and elegant on the palate.
Fresh, clean aromas of citrus, tinged with breaded and creamy hints gives a lively Champagne with great poise and elegance.

item.Product_name: Tesco Finest Premier Cru Champagne Brut 750ml
item.description: A fine, crisp and elegant quality with a delicate mousse, hints of citrus aromas and a creamy texture.

item.Product_name: Tesco Finest Vintage Grand Cru Champagne 750ml
item.description: A full-bodied, complex, dry Champagne, rich and rounded citrus flavours with an elegant mousse
A delightfully rich and classic pink champagne, full of fresh strawberry and red fruit flavours.
Hints of spring flowers with a touch of toast and honey. This is followed by strong fruit and balancing citrus flavours.

item.Product_name: Lanson Champagne Gold Label Brut Vintage 75cl
item.description: Made from a blend of Pinot Noir and Chardonnay grapes hand-picked from Grand Cru vineyards, this elegant Champagne has glorious aromas of spiced pineapple, peach and baked apple. It tastes fuller and richer than a non vintage with a lovely honeyed aftertaste that lingers in the mouth.

item.Product_name: Lanson Champagne Rose Pink Coated Bottle 75cl
item.description: A pale rose champagne with salmon tints. Lanson Rose Label shows aromas of rose and red fruits in the glass whilst on the palate the initial impression is well-rounded and fresh with good balance and length on the finish.
Delicate bubbles reflecting hints of green and gold. Nose: Lime flowers and lemon balm mingle with notes of bitter orange and quince. Palate: Fresh with an elegant crisp acidity. Medium body.

item.Product_name: Nicolas Feuillate Millésime Brut Champagne Cuvee Spéciale 750ml
item.description: Pale gold in colour with aromas of citrus fruit on the nose. This delicate and elegant fruity Champagne offers a Long and lingering finish, a magnificent cuvée.

A pale golden colour with a fine stream of bubbles. On the nose, subtle white fruit aromas such as apples and pears. On the palate, dry, crisp and well balanced. Fruit and citrus aromas and a long length.
Full of ripe citrus and tropical fruits with a refreshing and a fruity finish.

Has aromas of blueberries and plums on the nose, with hints of vanilla. The full-bodied palate shows cherry and wild berry flavours with chocolate notes, complemented by fresh tannins and a long, elegant finish.
A delightfully crisp, dry wine with a pronounced nose of roses and red fruit and long, pleasing aftertaste.

It is strong in color, beautiful and deep ruby red. Butterscotch and the subtle spiciness makes it appealing, with a strong personal character. The well integrated vanilla flavors comes from the oak aging, and adds complexity and elegance. This is a medium to full bodied wine but yet soft and friendly in the palate due to the sweet and firm tannins of the Carménère component.
On the nose intense flowery scents of violet are evident while on the palate flavors are intense yet very elegant with a clear predominance of strawberries, making this a very appealing Pinot Noir

On the palate it is refreshingly crisp, sparkling, soft and sumptuous, showing great complexity, very fresh and crispy with a nice structure at mid palate showing tropical fruits, peaches, pineapples and citric accents.
Codorníu has been making wine since 1551, and this bottle-fermented and aged sparkler is stunning-With great depth of flavour, it has delicious fruity notes and a refreshingly crisp finish.
Bursting with summer fruits, this rosado Cava is made with grapes from a single harvest, creating a delightful aperitif or wine for white meats and fish.
Very pale straw yellow in colour with elegant fine bubbles. On the nose, typical varietal aromas (citrus, almond flowers) are prominent. Pleasant, fresh and well balanced on the palate.
Delicate pale pink colour with fine bubbles. Red fruit and citrus aromas complemented with hints of pastry and yeast from ageing on the lees.

item.Product_name: Codorníu Reina Maria Cristina Blanc de Noirs Reserva Vintage Cava
item.description: A unique cava made from a selection of our best grapes, which provide a delicate flavour, floral aromas and amazing red fruit notes. A complex and perfectly balanced cava notable for its elegance and delicacy.

A smooth, full-bodied Cabernet Sauvignon with cassis and black cherry flavours, complemented by hints of coffee and dark chocolate. Food Match: A great choice to match with red meats, herby dishes or mature cheeses.

Hints of Chocolate, coffee and spice combine with raspberry and blackberry flavours in this medium-bodied Carmenere, Chile’s very own grape.Food Match: Perfect for tasty winter stews or grilled summer barbecues.

item.Product_name: Casillero del Diablo Reserva Casablanca Sauvignon Blanc 75cl
item.description: Refreshing and light-bodied with zesty melon and gooseberry flavours and a crisp, dry finish. Food Match: Perfect to savour on its own, or to pair with simple fish, chicken and lightly spiced Asian food.

A crisp mineral Chardonnay, deeply concentrated with a silky mouth-feel. It is loaded with pear and fig with a hint of hazelnut character alongside the limestone chalky zing which the Limarí Valley delivers in white varieties.
The bright, dark deep red colour of this wine sets the tone for the flavours that are dark cherries, berries and smoky notes.
Blackberry, plum and redcurrant aromas meld seamlessly with black pepper and spice notes. Overall it falls full and complex on the palate that finishes wonderfully smooth and long.
Our organically grown Chardonnay has aromas of honey and toasted almonds, quickly followed by pineapple, lemon and crème brulee.

Aromas of brambly fruit and ripe blueberries accented with hints of toasty oak and vanilla. The characteristically Zinfandel flavors of plum, blueberry and black pepper lead to an elegant, balanced and soft finish.
This voluptuous Pinot Noir is full of rich aromas and flavours of cherry, plum and strawberry, finished with a subtle spiciness.

item.Product_name: CYT Otorio Late Harvest Sauvignon Blanc 37.5cl (Half Bottle)
item.description: A wine with a complex taste of honey, together with a special feeling of mature fruit.
A deep, ruby red with violet hues, the wine's delicious combination of aromas hint of mint, cherries and chocolate.
Plum and rasberry flavours combine elegantly with vanilla notes from the oak. Well balanced exhibiting sweet tannins and a velvety finish.
This wine has a complex bouquet of dried fruits and vanilla while the palate is elegant with a long fruity finish.
91/100 in Parker’s Wine Buyer’s Guide, this fantastic wine has berry and spice overtones with a vanilla finish.

From the Central Valley near the capital Santiago, this is a brilliant example of a Chilean Merlot-Fruity, full bodied, dark red and luscious, this wine has delightful berry notes along with masses of ripe black fruit and plum flavours and a lovely long aftertaste.

item.Product_name: Champagne Michel Gonet Blanc de Blancs Grand Cru NV
item.description: Pale gold colour with fine persistent bubbles. Aromas of citrus and white flowers that give way to buttery brioche notes on the palate. A powerful and rich style of Champagne with finesse and elegance through the mineral quality of the Chardonnay.

This delicious Champagne is pale gold in colour with fine persistent bubbles. The nose is delicately fruity with aromas of brioche while the palate is fresh and elegant with a creamy texture and a long finish.
This Pinot Grigio from the northeast of Italy has enticing citrus flavours and fragrant floral aromas. It’s a light and versatile wine for any occasion.

item.Product_name: Denbies Broadwood's Folly Brut Sparkling Wine 75cl
item.description: This wine offers generous fresh citrus and toasty brioche notes on the nose. The palate is crisp, dry and refreshing thanks to its finely balanced acidity. It has an enticing creamy texture with a persistent length of flavour.

Evocative of a traditional English orchard with fruity flavours of apples and pears complemented by subtle notes of freshly cut grass, elderflower and fruit-blossom. A deliciously crisp wine, with a dry and refreshing finish that encapsulates the mouth-watering juicy bite of a fresh-picked English apple.

item.Product_name: Brunello Di Montalcino Casa Di Baldassi
item.description: Made exclusively from the Sangiovese grape, Brunello di Montalcino is Tuscany’s premier red- With four years maturing in fine oak barrels, this wine is a delicious balance of cherries and plums with a pinch of spice.

item.Product_name: Castillo de la Cruz Valdepeñas Gran Reserva
item.description: It has a lovely russet colour and a spicy red fruit palate followed by melted, toasty oak tannins, and a long mellow finish.

Beautifully balanced with fresh pear aromas and a hint of fresh-baked bread. Aged for three years before release to allow the wine time to come together in the bottle. As per the house style, it is a Chardonnay-based blend, with Pinot Noir and Pinot Meunier adding structure, fruit and roundness.
Deep in colour, rich, full bodied. On the palate it is well balanced with the classic signature of Chianti which make it such a good match with food.

item.Product_name: Santa Ana La Mascota Cabernet Sauvignon 75cl
item.description: Deep red in colour with hints of violet. Aroma of liquorice, cassis and warm raspberry jam. Full-bodied, complex and a very long after taste
A vibrant white from Sicily. Soft spices and white peach scents make this lively and fresh, with a hint of almonds on the finish.
Another Argentinian gem, this elegant wine is bursting with refreshing lemon flavours and subtle vanilla oak. Great with barbecued chicken.
Big and bold, this gutsy Shiraz from the Western Cape is the perfect partner for grilled meat such as minted lamb kebabs.

item.Product_name: Fairhills Fairtrade Fair & Light Fruity Rosé 75cl
item.description: Vibrant up front flavours of sweet strawberries and cranberries

item.Product_name: Fairhills Fairtrade Fair & Light Yummy Red 75cl
item.description: Vibrant up front flavours of sweet raspberries.

item.Product_name: Fairhills Fairtrade Fair & Light Zesty White 75cl
item.description: Vibrant up front flavours of sweet mangos, papayas and pineapples.

Deep, vibrant ruby coloured. Pungent spice and fruit on nose, coupled with subtle toasty vanilla oak complimenting the blackcurrant/raspberry aromas. Medium bodied palate with easy tannin structure and length.
Layers of flavours, starting with raspberries, through herbs and spices and ultimately black pepper
Rich and fruity, with flavours of blackberry jam and black cherries with a smooth finish
Richly flavoured with plum and black cherry fruit flavours leading into hints of dark chocolate and jam followed by a big, fruit-packed finish.
Concentrated, smooth luscious flavours of plum and black cherry with hints of dark chocolate and treacle. A rich, deep, warming finish.

item.Product_name: Tesco Finest Côtes de Gascogne Gros Manseng Sauvignon Blanc 750ml
item.description: A clean crisp wine full of citrusy fruit flavours

item.Product_name: Tesco Finest Cotes du Rhone Villages Plan de Dieu
item.description: Intensive and vivid red colour. Very rich, aromatic and structured wine, rounded tannins, soft and elegant wine.
Discovery Series Merlot has nuances of ripe plum and hedgerow berries on the nose. In the mouth the wine is often soft and juicy with flavours of black plum and blackberry.

item.Product_name: First Cape Discovery Series Light with Pinot Grigio 750ml
item.description: For our new FirstCape Light range, our winemakers have used a range of techniques to blend together delicious light Italian Pinot Grigio wine with fragrant aromas to create a wonderfully refreshing drink. Spicy pineapple and citrus notes on the nose, with passion fruit and apple flavours on the palate. Wonderfully crisp and refreshing.

item.Product_name: First Cape Discovery Series Light with Sauvignon Blanc 750ml
item.description: For our new FirstCape Light range, our winemakers have used a range of techniques to blend together delicious light New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc wine with fragrant aromas to create a wonderfully refreshing drink. Classic Sauvignon aromas of asparagus and gooseberry. The taste is crisp, clean and refreshing with notes of lemon and pineapple.

item.Product_name: First Cape Discovery Series Light with White Zinfandel 750ml
item.description: For our new FirstCape Light range, our winemakers have used a range of techniques to blend together delicious Californian White Zinfandel wine with fragrant aromas to create a wonderfully refreshing drink. An appealing bouquet of wild strawberries and apple blossom leads into a crisp, refreshing palate with soft red fruits, cranberry and honeysuckle characteristics.
A wonderfully fresh South African Sauvignon, showing aromas of pear drops and citrus on the nose. Delicious with salads, white meats and fish dishes.
A perfect example of a South African Shiraz with rich, spicy aromas on the nose and dark berry fruit lingering on the palate.
This sparkling wine from North East Italy is classically refreshing & lively with crisp fruit flavours & floral notes
Foscana Merlot is a warm, soft and smooth red with light tannin and deep red and black fruit flavours.
From the vineyards of North Italy, this Pinot Grigio is typically refreshing crisp and dry. With aromas of green apples it displays delightfully delicate citrus notes on the palate

item.Product_name: Tesco Finest Barbera d'Asti Superiore DOC 75cl
item.description: A rich, opulent wine with hints of black cherries, blueberries, vanilla and allspice.

item.Product_name: Jeeper Grand Réserve Chardonnay Brut Champagne 750ml
item.description: Jeeper Grande Reserve Elégance is a blancs de blancs champagne, made from a special blend of chardonnay grapes from 11 different vineyards. Light and elegant, with fine bubbles. Floral and lemon notes follow through from the nose, with a hint of quince jam and freshly baked bread

item.Product_name: Jeeper Premier Cru NV Brut Champagne
item.description: “This is made with grapes from classified Premier Cru vineyards-The result is a luscious, creamy wine with honeyed fruit flavours-It’s delicious on its own but we also like to drink it with veal in mushroom sauce-” Myriam Dubois

item.Product_name: Marques de Chivé Tempranillo Valdepeñas Reserva 75cl
item.description: Vibrant ruby red, with attractive aromas of blackberry and plum, balanced with a touch of dark chocolate and vanilla. The palate is rich and smooth, with spicy tannins and a well-balanced finish. This wine is aged in oak barrels for 2 years.

item.Product_name: Vina Albali Gran Reserva de Familia
item.description: A beautifully mature red with delicious raspberry and cranberry flavours, made smooth and mellow by oak ageing.

This mature wine has a complex elegant bouquet with hints of leather and spices. On the palate it's well balanced and expressive with rounded and polished tannins. The perfect accompaniment for all kinds of meat, stews or cured cheeses.
Lifted aromas of nettles, snow peas, guava and flint characters. The palate has a citrus and grapefruit approach followed by a mineral mid palate, elegant texture and a long finish.

This excellent Saint-Émilion Grand Cru has been made by the same family for eight generations. From the 2006 vintage, this magnificent claret, a blend of Merlot, Cabernet Franc and a little Cabernet Sauvignon, is drinking extremely well. Elegant, smoky aromas of cassis, liquorice and cigar boxes lead on to the classic smooth, mellow red-fruit flavours of mature Bordeaux. Delicious with beef.

item.Product_name: Freixenet Elyssia Cava Pinot Noir Brut 750ml
item.description: Delightfully crisp and fruity, this fabulous sparkling rosado is scented with berry fruits and has a lovely, sweet aftertaste. Made from black grapes, it spends a short time in contact with the dark skins to produce its wonderful pink colour.

item.Product_name: Freixenet Elyssia Gran Cuvée Cava Brut
item.description: This mouthwatering sparkler combines ripe pear, apple, tangy lemon and melon flavours with a fresh youthful zestiness. Sophisticated scents of roasted nuts, citrus fruit and honey are followed by a dry, crisp finish.
A top quality Spanish sparkler, packed with fresh citrus, ripe melon and stonefruit-Serve cold in a chilled glass to get maximum refreshment.
Bursting with summer fruit flavours, this refreshing rosé made from Garnacha and the local Trepat grape is a great way to welcome your guests.

item.Product_name: Tesco Finest Chateau Le Barrail Medoc 75cl
item.description: This medal winning red wine displays ripe red berry and currant characteristics, is delicate and fruity, with soft tannins. A fantastic wine to complement grilled sirloin, steak fajitas or burgers.

Gallo Family Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2008 is medium bodied with a smooth finish. It has mouthwatering flavours of jammy blackberry and raspberry with hints of cassis. This is combined with well integrated oak and flavours of cinnamon and clove.
This wine offers all the flavour of the Merlot grape – ripe plum, blueberry and hints of cranberry – in a lighter-bodied style.
Our Gallo Moscato is a lusciously sweet wine with flavours of tropical fruit such as pineapple and peach. Hints of orange blossoms and honey complement the fruity, yet refreshing finish.
Gallo Family Vineyards 2008 Pinot Grigio is medium bodied and has a vibrant quality. It showcases apple and citrus flavours with hints of orange blossom and peach on the finish.
Our Summer Red is a refreshing, fruity wine that has a lighter, softer, sweeter taste.

A light-bodied wine. Treat your taste buds with vibrant flavours of fresh strawberry, watermelon and a touch of floral spice. Crisp and fresh with a smooth finish it is refreshing and great to enjoy either by itself or with a variety of food.
Dense, bright cherry red in colour, with intense aromas of red fruits, bread and fine wood.

A full and luscious wine, aged in French and American oak for 9 months, giving it fine vanilla notes which combine perfectly with spice and herbal characters and intense fruit with hints of coffee. Full bodied, with great structure
Distinctive aromatics, intensely flavoured and lively fruit, refreshingly crisp acidity and a long flavoursome finish.

item.Product_name: Jackson Estate Grey Ghost Sauvignon Blanc 75cl
item.description: Soft peachy fruit characters blend perfectly with gentle toasty oak aromas. The palate is flinty and savoury with great length.

item.Product_name: Tio Pepe Jérèz Sherry Palomino Fino
item.description: An elegant Fino with fresh bread and almond aromas. Full bodied, crisp and very dry, with a complex, long finish

item.Product_name: Wirra Wirra Church Block McLaren Vale 750ml
item.description: Succulent ripe berry fruit characters on the palate mingle with warm cedar and leather aromas. The generous fruit is balanced with well integrated oak and soft tannins to produce a delicious wine with great length and style.
The Tempranillo grape thrives in the stony vineyards of Valdepeñas and its ripe, mellow wines.

item.Product_name: Gran Familia Las Primas Airen Verdejo
item.description: Pale straw in colour with aromas of white peach which follow through on the palate. Light, fresh and well balanced.
Bright ruby colour with ripe black fruit on the nose and palate and a long fresh finish.

item.Product_name: Gran Familia Las Primas Tempranillo Rosado
item.description: Intense rose colour with fresh berry aromas which follows through on the palate to a smooth finish
Perfect balance of luscious fruit and silky tannins. Full-bodied with plenty of meaty, warm, ripe red fruit flavours.

Deep purple with a crimson rim. On the nose, this wine has pronounced red summer fruits with warm, well integrated vanilla notes. The palate is medium to full bodied with lush red fruits creamy oak and smooth tannins.
Soft and fruity white wine. It has aromas of tropical fruits and notes of grapefruit and vanilla.

item.Product_name: J.P. Chenet Merlot Vin de Pays 75cl
item.description: A smooth and mellow red wine with aromas of red fruit, blackcurrants, cherries and raspberry jam.
Dry and crisp white wine with aromas of white pears.
A smooth and mellow red wine with red fruit flavours and notes of pepper, liquorice and spices.
A violet purple colour, rich and fruity with a hint of spice.

item.Product_name: Calvet Roc St Gilles Montagne St Emilion
item.description: A ruby red wine balanced with hints of red fruit and pepper
Fruity, mellow and elegant wine
A round, fresh wine with hints of exotic fruits. Can be enjoyed on its own as an aperitif or with fish and goats cheeses.
Pear and citrus notes.
Fruity and soft. The finish is smooth with lingering flavours of raspberry.
This Cabernet Sauvignon offers a rich mouthful of juicy black fruit, and a magnificent toasty oak taste that lingers.
Mouthwatering and refreshing, this Pinot Grigio from California’s sunny San Joaquin Valley has lingering flavours of tangy citrus and pear.
Aromas of ripe black cherries are echoed on the palate with flavours of sweet juicy plums, a subtle cinnamon spiciness and a soft velvety finish.
This big Californian red combines rich berry fruit flavours together with a hint of mint and toasty oak – great with lamb steaks.

Chile is gaining an enviable reputation for top-quality Sauvignon Blanc, and this is a glorious example from north of Santiago in the Elqui Valley-The altitude and cool mountain air currents result in a wine with fresh citrus scents and lots of zingy gooseberry flavours- Try pairing it with grilled white fish seasoned with dill and lemon.
From Chile’s up-and-coming Coquimbo region, this is a rich Shiraz with heady aromas of dark berry fruits and intense flavours of juicy ripe plums. It has a fabulously smooth texture..

item.Product_name: Domaine de Bel Air Cuvee des Acoins Pouilly Fume 75cl
item.description: A rich wine. Passionfruit and mango tropical fruit flavours mingle with fresh citrus notes and the typical slate and mineral character expected from classic Sancerre. Full, balanced and vivacious, this wine finishes with excellent length.

The soft bouquet opens with cherry, raspberry and classic Pinot Noir spice, with subtle undertones of vanilla. Supple and smooth on the palate with lashings of sweet fruit, finely polished tannins and balanced acidity; vibrant fruit flavours and varietal spice notes, the wine finished with great length and focus.

Aromas of white and black pepper, violets, plum and a subtle chocolate and leather spiciness. A medium bodied complex wine in the mode of northern Rhone showing Plum, pepper and cinnamon characteristics with a slight bacon note on the finish. A firm acid backbone with silky tannins harmonizes with the fruit and culminates in a warm ripe finish.

The wine has an intense and elegant aroma, with hints of fresh ripe apples, pears, and apricots, as well as nuances of tropical fruit. On the palate it is rich, mellow, rounded and full-bodied, with a rich tropical character and a lingering finish.

Deep red in colour, with a ripe and fresh aromatic intensity. Dry fruits, black cherry and cassis aromas. This Cabernet Franc has a nice floral and spicy touch, menthol, vanilla, caramel and a smoky tone due to the ageing. A full-bodied wine, with strong tannins; elegant and well balanced. It has a long, persistent finish and great potential to evolve.

item.Product_name: Willunga 100 The Olive Branch Cabernet Shiraz 75cl
item.description: This is a serious wine with aromas of dark plum, cherry, spice and earthy undertones. It is rich and generous, with dark berries on the palate and a good long tannin structure, integrated with older French oak. It will age very well.
Refreshing apricot scented dry white wine, with elegant citrus fruit flavors
Lovely flavours of dark cherry and chocolate combine perfectly in this full flavored Cabernet Sauvignon.
Delightful tropical fruit flavours and aromas of apricot and pear are a feature of this light and crisp Pinot Grigio.
A delicate, refreshing rosé with summer hues of strawberry and raspberry, complimented by a lovely crisp finish.
This wine is fresh, crisp and packed full of tropical fruits with lifted aromatics, texture and elegance.
Generous flavors of plum and raspberry are bursting out of this Shiraz with a hint of chocolate and oak.

Colour is light golden straw with green hues. Aromas of fresh light citrus, tropical fruit and vanilla. This wine exhibits generous melon and fresh tropical fruit characters, with a refreshing acid line and integrated vanillin oak. The soft mouth feel and generous flavour profile continue with great length and a clean soft finish.

Chardonnay and Semillon are skilfully blended to create a refreshing and vibrant white wine. It is packed full of lovely tropical fruit flavours that are complimented by a lively citrus finish. A versatile wine that is a fantastic accompaniment to fresh seafood or lightly spiced Thai cuisine
A light and luscious rose full of lovely flavors of strawberry and raspberry with a crisp, refreshing, dry finish. Fantastic well chilled on its own or as addition to alfresco dining.

Shiraz and Cabernet are skillfully blended to create a rich full-bodied red wine full of lovely spicy plum and blackberry flavors that are complimented by a touch of vanilla oak. A versatile wine that is a fantastic accompaniment to beef bourguignon or vegetarian lasagna
The deliciously crisp palate displays toasty, creamy complexity, enhanced by a lingering nutty finish.
Uplifting aromas of ripe lime and grapefruit, nectarine, papaya and mango and floral notes of orange blossom, gooseberry and sweet fennel.

item.Product_name: Terrazas de los Andes Selection Malbec 750ml
item.description: Extremely fruity. Black cherries, prunes and raisins are combined with vanilla, caramel and toasted notes to define a very complex nose.
Red fruits, especially cassis and cherries stand out. Spices and white pepper together with dried fruits such as almonds, are supported by vanilla and toasted notes provided by the oak.
Predominance of fresh mature fruit like lime, apricot and peach together with tropical fruit, supported by vanilla and toasted notes provided by the oak.
Gold medal winning wine with aromas of white flowers such as orange blossom and rose, with concentrated fruity notes of pear, mango and passion fruit.
A soft, warming red with flavours of raspberry, black cherry and just a hint of spice.
A crisp white wine with intense citrus fruit flavours
An elegant white wine with aromas of fresh lime and gooseberries and zesty citrus and tropical fruit flavours
A smooth red wine with flavours of black cherry and ripe blackcurrant
This lively, refreshing white with aromas of ripe apples and pears.
A concentrated, smooth red wine with seductive dark fruit aromas.
Our Chardonnay is an elegant and unoaked dry wine with crisp citrus fruit flavours and a refreshing finish.
This wine has a typical ruby red colour and a clean bouquet with notes of currants and violets. It is an elegant and well-structured fruity wine with a smooth finish.
Our Pinot Grigio shows aromas of melon and citrus fruit. Well balanced with crisp lemon flavours and a refreshing hint of orange blossom.
Our Pinot Grigio Rosé is a well balanced dry wine with an elegant fruity bouquet leading to a pleasant and refreshing finish.
A soft and juicy wine, packed full of spicy blackcurrant and raspberry fruit flavours. Great with grilled meats and pasta.
A light, dry rosé with refreshing raspberry and strawberry flavours, leading to a sweet finish.
The Pathway Sauvignon Blanc is a classic expression of Marlborough from Ara. Fully flavoured Sauvignon Blanc with lively citrus and tropical fruit aromas, delivered with a clean refreshing finish.

item.Product_name: Oxford Landing Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Shiraz
item.description: Rich in plum and blackberry fruitiness, with dark cherry, licorice and spice of Shiraz and elegance and structure of Cabernet.
This soft, silky Merlot is a generous wine, brimming with the sweetness of cherries and plums.
The popular and refreshing Oxford Landing Sauvignon Blanc is bursting with zesty, citrus characters.
This is classic Cabernet Sauvignon with layers of intense forest berries infused with earthy spice and cassis.
Ripe plum, berry fruits and hints of spice, accentuated with a nuance of oak and an elegant, lingering soft texture.
Elegant, assertive wines with glorious fruit flavours.
Elegant, assertive with glorious fruit flavours.
Passion fruit, ripe lemon and tropical fruit, lively and finely textured, beset with lingering citrus notes.
Elegant cool climate varietal intensity – radiant lime, citrus and white peach, accentuated by a finely bubbled palate with a crisp, refreshing finish.

In this wine, green olives and herbaceous aromas with underlying fennel notes dominate the nose. The palate is flavoursome showing a rich concentration of pure Marlborough Sauvignon characters. The fresh capsicum notes are complemented by an oily texture and tantalising minerality, held together by a crisp acidity that leads to a lingering finish.
Bold, ripe aromas of fresh cut grass and passion fruit. A dry, fresh, fruit-driven wine with intense flavours.
This Reserva exudes flavours of warm cinnamon, cigar box and ripe red fruits. An exceptionally smooth wine with hints of spicy oak.

Deep cherry colour which is typical of vibrant Tempranillo wine. The wine has a pronounced nose full of rich, intense aromas of ripe red fruits with subtle, sweet notes of vanilla and sweet spices. The palate is fresh, soft and velvety with flavours of redcurrants, vanilla and chocolate leading to a long elegant finish.

item.Product_name: Jacob’s Creek Reserve Adelaide Hills Sauvignon Blanc
item.description: Passionfruit, citrus and tropical flavours balanced with a fresh natural acidity that adds vibrancy and length to the palate.
Full bodied with complex flavours of mulberry, plum and chocolate typical of the Barossa region with excellent fruit length.

The wine is pale straw in colour with fine-beaded mousse. The nose is characterised by aromas of ripe tropical fruit and vibrant passionfruit. The palate shows intense stone fruit flavours and is full and textural with a tantalising minerality. This wine shows fantastic equilibrium of concentrated fruit flavours and zesty acidity.

Lively pink with purple hues. Fresh picked strawberries and raspberries with a delicate spiciness in the background. Bursting with fresh berry fruit, reminiscent of biting into a summer strawberry, followed by a gentle finish of nicely tempered spice and quince.

item.Product_name: Jacob's Creek Cool Harvest Sauvignon Blanc 75cl
item.description: Light straw with green hues. Fresh tropical and citrus notes with a passionfruit background. Refreshing and zesty balance of lychee, lemongrass and citrus. The palate shows lovely balanced acidity which is vibrant to the finish.
Light straw with green hues. Fresh lemon zest with white floral and tropical notes. A light clean palate with zingy lemon citrus carrying through to subtle honeysuckle balanced by vibrant acidity.
Full weight with refreshing blackberry, and rich raspberry fruit characters. Soft velvety tannin and fine persistent mousse.

item.Product_name: Jacobs Creek Cool Harvest Sparkling Sauvignon Blanc
item.description: Fresh tropical and citrus notes with a passionfruit background. Refreshingly effervescent with zesty flavours of lychee, lemongrass and citrus carried through by a vibrant acidity to the finish.
Red ruby, clean with medium colour intensity. A very fruity and intense nose with hints of strawberry, blueberry, vanilla and a balsamic finish. In the mouth it is round, velvety and mouth filling.

Merlot is a widely grown grape in Chile, and on the Errazuriz Estate grows in a Mediterranean climate, with warm summer days and cool evenings-This impressively rich and juicy wine has notes of plum and raspberry, turning to fruity ripe cherry and blackberry on the palate-Hints of oak and spice help the taste to linger.

Our unoaked Chardonnay is an intense, crisp and vibrant wine with a greenish-yellow colour and a very expressive nose. Flavours of guava, mango and passion fruit highlight its tropical fruit and citrus qualities.

item.Product_name: Louis Jadot Beaujolais Villages Combe aux Jacques 75cl
item.description: Bursting with ripe, juicy raspberry and cherry fruit flavours. Light bodied, beautifully balanced and truly scrumptious.
A benchmark red Burgundy. Silky smooth, light to medium- bodied with fragrant floral aromas and light red fruit flavours.

This wine is fruity and floral. It is mellow and elegant but also a little racy. With a silky texture and a structure of lovely finesse. Full, ripe red fruits are balanced by a supple freshness and acidity on the palate.

Founded in 1858, Gauthier has a long and prestigious history – it was once the official Champagne of the Swedish court- Aged for three years in bottle, this Brut Grande Réserve lives up to its pedigree with a lovely gold colour, delicate mousse, floral aromas and a biscuity aftertaste – all the qualities you’d expect of a top vintage Champagne but without the price tag.
With mouthwatering cherry and strawberry fruit flavours and a lovely touch of vanilla, this first class Marlborough Pinot Noir is an ideal partner for duck and other game dishes.
A soft medium-bodied red wine with flavours of red berries and a velvety smooth finish.

item.Product_name: Blason de Bourgogne Mâcon Villages Chardonnay
item.description: A wine with soft white peach aromas and a rich apricot and pear palate with zesty mandarin orange hints

item.Product_name: D'Arenberg, The High Trellis Cabernet Sauvignon, McLaren Vale, 2009 75cl
item.description: Blackcurrant, plum and mulberry fruit mix with toasty vanilla oak and sweet spice.
This silky smooth Rioja Reserva was awarded four stars by Decanter magazine - Made with old vine Tempranillo fruit, the wine was aged for a year in oak and a further two years in bottle.
This fine vintage champagne shows an elegant richness and an appealing complexity

Although the first vines were only planted in the 1960s, Margaret River, located south of Perth on Australia’s west coast, quickly became one of the country’s premium winemaking regions. Its sunny but cool maritime climate is particularly suited to producing a crisp, elegant style of Chardonnay more traditionally found in Burgundy. This complex, stylish wine has subtle aromas of white stone fruits, rich peach and citrus flavours, and a creamy texture from nine months of gentle oak ageing
Deep violet-red in colour with aromas of raspberries and cherries. a full bodies palate of black fruits and chocolate notes with a long smooth finish.

item.Product_name: Las Cometas Chilean Reserva Sauvignon Blanc
item.description: Made famous by the wines of Sancerre in France, Sauvignon Blanc is now found pretty much everywhere- In Chile it’s really coming into its own and this one is fresh, crisp and deliciously dry, made from grapes grown in the Central Valley, Chile’s natural fruit bowl- With white peach and grapefruit flavours, there’s a touch of tropical fruit too- Loves salads and seafood.

item.Product_name: Baron de Ley 7 Vinas Rioja Reserva
item.description: Deep ruby colour, aromas of red berries and vanilla spice. Flavours of sweet fruit & complex, spicy oak with a smooth finish.

item.Product_name: Jean Claude Fromont Chablis Premier Cru 75cl
item.description: Beautifully golden in colour with elegant aromas of peaches and apricots with honey notes and hints of exotic fruits. Round and velvety on the palate with a clean long finish.

Multi-layered and intense, this classic Malbec is from the high-altitude yet frost-free La Mascota vineyard- Rich, purplyred in colour with scents of red fruits and vanilla complementing sweetberry flavours, this is a worthy award winner.
With intense tastes of liquorice and blackberry this fabulously complex wine is made from dried grapes that are picked early and added to the blend.

item.Product_name: Old Renwick Road Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc
item.description: World-class Sauvignon Blanc and Marlborough go hand-in-hand, thanks to the unique climate of this part of New Zealand- With trademark flavours of gooseberry and juicy stonefruit and a mouthwatering aftertaste, this is a rich, complex wine that can be enjoyed on its own or with seafood.

item.Product_name: Le Cellier des Princes Châteauneuf du Pape Blanc
item.description: This wine has a brilliant and bright golden colour with aromas of honey with white flowers. In the mouth the wine is ample and fruity
This award winning Rosé has intense fruity aromas, mouth watering juiciness, crisp, fresh flavours with hints of strawberries and raspberries.
Smooth and mature, this classic Bordeaux has subtle scents of cherry and coffee and a delicately spicy aftertaste- Brilliant with roast beef.

Made in Piedmont from Nebbiolo grapes, Barolo is one of Italy’s most famous red wines- Enticing aromas of tobacco and spice, deep dried fruit flavours and a touch of oak make this gold medal-winner a wonderful example- Perfect with roasts and cheese.

A deliciously dry yet fruity white Rioja with a fresh appealing taste. Grape Varieties: Viura. Ageing: This wine is best enjoyed when young and fresh. Great With: Sea food, white meat and salads. Serve: Enjoy this wine chilled 9-11°C.
Deeply dark, with hints of tiled red. Aromas of small red and black fruits and spice. The mouth is very well balanced with dark fruit and liquorice flavours and velvety tannins.

This elegant Amarone has been made in the traditional Italian way, using partially dried grapes- The result is a dry and luxuriously complex wine with intense flavours of damson fruit, and seasoned with spicy French oak.

This multi-award winning wine is a dry bright white, fruited, young refreshing wine with apple and lemon notes in the aroma and tasting. It’s a pleasant and easy drinking wine, smooth, a real day by day wine.
Elegant aromas of strawberries and red cherries with a refreshingly crisp aftertaste.

This wine has great balance of flavour, alcohol, sweetness and acidity. The result is a wine with pear, lychee and peach flavours complemented by fullness and some sweetness in the middle palate, and cleansing acidity.
This is a medium-bodied, spicy and savoury wine with cherry and strawberry aromas and flavours.
Lively aromas and flavours of lime and lemon, a firm crisp structure, bracing acidity and a well rounded soft long finish.
This aromatic wine has grassy and stone fruit citrus flavours, great balance and a mouthfilling finish.
Full bodied and refined, this is a ripe, robust and generously flavoured wine of dark, black conserve fruit flavours.

item.Product_name: Tim Adams The Fergus, Clare Valley 75cl
item.description: The wine has strong varietal character, aromatic and spicy, with mouthfilling flavour and fine tannins.
Powerful aromas of vanilla and fruit. A rich, velvety, smooth taste with black cherry flavours and spicy vanilla oak.
This Silver medal winning wine shows off the Tempranillo grape brilliantlywith its dark berry flavours and lingering velvety spiciness. It’s a well-known favourite and would make a great gift too.

item.Product_name: La-Vis Pinot Grigio Trentino Doc Vigneti Di Montagna

item.description: Deliciously fruity and refined, this award-winning vintage sparkler is light, refreshing and fantastic as an aperitif – the perfect celebration fizz.

item.Product_name: Marques de Monistrol Vintage Cava Rosé Brut 750ml
item.description: Perfect pink Made from Monastrell and Pinot Noir grapes and packed with red berry fruit flavours, this lovely vintage rosé tastes just as good on its own or with a mouthwatering fruity dessert, such as blackberry parfait-It’s perfect for special occasions.
A lovely bright cherry red. Spicy cloves on the nose, with a wonderfully refined black cherry and plum fruitiness.

Floral lime and peach notes combined with tantalising citrus blossom and nectarine on the palate. This wine has a fresh crisp acidity balanced by harmonious natural sugar resulting in an off dry style.

item.Product_name: Villa Maria Cellar Selection Pinot Noir
item.description: Rich, generous ripe dark fruit, with a complex and full finish. Serve with red and white meat or cheese.
Ripe melon and peach on the nose, with creamy fruit flavours and a soft dry finish.

A fragrant bouquet of fresh lime -blossom, strawberry and guava notes dominate the nose. The palate is fresh and full flavoured with lovely richness and lively acidity, with a balanced and polished dry finish.

item.Product_name: Villa Maria Private Bin Sauvignon Blanc 750ml
item.description: Bursting with aromas of ripe passion fruit and fresh citrus lime. This is a crisp, juicy, full-flavoured refreshing dry wine.

A seductively perfumed bouquet of red and dark cherries, plums and subtle spicy clove notes on the nose. The wine is enhanced by an elegant and refined concentrated palate displaying richness and generosity. The complex palate is layered and balanced, complemented by fine silky tannins, all hallmark traits of minimalist winemaking. A classic Marlborough Pinot Noir that will offer intrigue for years to come.

Ruby with slight russet hues. Notes of red fruit which are characteristic of tempranillo, underlain with spicy and toasty notes from aging in barrels. Soft velvety tannins, fresh & elegant with a long finish.
Made with 100% Tempranillo and aged for 12 months in American oak barriques. Deep red colour with violet hints, this wine has notes of dark fruits, licorice and subtle roasted flavours.
Clear, bright and deep ruby in colour, it has clean and intense aromatics, with red fruits and subtle oak character: notes of tobacco, truffle and spice.
This wine has an intense floral aroma and notes of green apple. It is medium bodied and, typical of Verdejo, it has balancing fresh acidity.
Clasic Wairau tropicality with herbal Awatere background notes of blackcurrant & tomato leaf. Palate is at once full but with reaching acidity and finishing with sweet fruit.

Tropical fruit, fresh green bell peppers and floral lime zest rise from the glass initially. This is well backed up by a vibrant, cutting fresh palate with deceptive power and concentration. Evidence of the lees contact adds a textural dimension to the focused palate and bouncing tropical fruit. This wine will develop in bottle over time and its complexity will become more marked between sweet fruit spectrum and almost savory herbal notes.
Soft, fresh and dry white wine. Grapey and peachy aromas combine with tropical notes of guava & lime.
Medium bodied, juicy & spicy red wine. Hints of strawberry & damson with a persistent lingering aftertaste.
Silver medal winner made from the same grapes that make port, this deep, rich, full-flavoured red tastes of a delightful mix of dark cherry and vanilla - Try it with roast beef.
This exciting wine combines rich, spicy flavours such as blackberries, pepper and cinnamon.
A deep coloured rose that is dry yet spicy and flavoursome.
Richer and more complex than the usual Vinho Verde, this delightful wine is crisp and dry, zinging with mouthwatering lemon and a refreshing suggestion of sherbet.
Soft, fresh and dry white wine. Grapey and peachy aromas combine with tropical notes of guava & lime.
Medium bodied, juicy & spicy red wine. Hints of strawberry & damson with a persistent lingering aftertaste.
Silver medal winner made from the same grapes that make port, this deep, rich, full-flavoured red tastes of a delightful mix of dark cherry and vanilla - Try it with roast beef.
This exciting wine combines rich, spicy flavours such as blackberries, pepper and cinnamon.
A deep coloured rose that is dry yet spicy and flavoursome.
Richer and more complex than the usual Vinho Verde, this delightful wine is crisp and dry, zinging with mouthwatering lemon and a refreshing suggestion of sherbet.
Soft, fresh and dry white wine. Grapey and peachy aromas combine with tropical notes of guava & lime.
Medium bodied, juicy & spicy red wine. Hints of strawberry & damson with a persistent lingering aftertaste.
Silver medal winner made from the same grapes that make port, this deep, rich, full-flavoured red tastes of a delightful mix of dark cherry and vanilla - Try it with roast beef.
This exciting wine combines rich, spicy flavours such as blackberries, pepper and cinnamon.
A deep coloured rose that is dry yet spicy and flavoursome.
Richer and more complex than the usual Vinho Verde, this delightful wine is crisp and dry, zinging with mouthwatering lemon and a refreshing suggestion of sherbet.
Soft, fresh and dry white wine. Grapey and peachy aromas combine with tropical notes of guava & lime.
Medium bodied, juicy & spicy red wine. Hints of strawberry & damson with a persistent lingering aftertaste.
Silver medal winner made from the same grapes that make port, this deep, rich, full-flavoured red tastes of a delightful mix of dark cherry and vanilla - Try it with roast beef.
This exciting wine combines rich, spicy flavours such as blackberries, pepper and cinnamon.
A deep coloured rose that is dry yet spicy and flavoursome.
Richer and more complex than the usual Vinho Verde, this delightful wine is crisp and dry, zinging with mouthwatering lemon and a refreshing suggestion of sherbet.

Full of rich and enticing flavours of blackberries, cocoa and vanilla. A good balance of berry flavours and spice lasts long on the palate. This wine is well-structured with toasted oak supporting soft fruit and velvety tannins.
Aromas of passionfruit, melon, freshly crushed grapes with flavours ofzingy tropical fruit and a crisp, refreshing finish.
Aromas of citrus, passionfruit and fresh grassy notes with flavours of ripe tropical fruits with a crisp green apple finish.

Vibrant, deep purple in colour, leading to a nose of berry aromas with spicy notes. The full bodied palalte shows generous ripe fruit charactors with underlying earth tones and lingering sweet berry flavours.
Forest fruit aromas followed by lush, velvety flavours of plums and damsons and a soft lingering finish.
Fresh, fruity aromas are followed by zesty peach flavours and a finish as crisp as Roger Federer's backhand.
Typical fresh Muscat notes on the nose. Crisp and elegant, soft in acidity, notes of peach and citrus fruits.
Aromas of forest berries enhance this full bodied red wine. The dry and soft flavor with the fruity bouquet and a hint of cherries make it an excellent Pinot Noir

Peter & Peter Riesling is crafted from hand-picked grapes grown on the most favorable slopes of the Mosel Valley. Only the steepest south-facing vineyards receive the optimum benefit of the sun and therefore the best conditions for ripening premium Riesling grapes. The wines are then immediately and gently pressed in our own pressing stations to accentuate their aromatic freshness. The result is an elegant wine with ripe fruit aromas of peach and apricot, counter balanced by crisp acidity.
